text: Stéphane Houdet was the defending champion, but lost to Nicolas Peifer in the quarterfinals. Alfie Hewett won his first title, defeating Shingo Kunieda in the final, 6–3, 7–5. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Bracket=== == External links == * Draw Wheelchair Men's Singles U.S. Open, 2018 Men's Singles
title: 2018 US Open – Wheelchair Men's Singles
